title: Cure - 1980 10 14 - Neue Welt, Berlin, Germany.flac

Full info on this show: http://www.cure-concerts.de/concerts/1980-10-14.php

Note that the set list conflicts with that above, but I can&#039;t find another show that better matches and is more likely, so I&#039;m sticking with the original label.

ONCE YOU HAVE DOWNLOADED THE FILE. PLEASE KEEP SEEDING AS I HAVE RESTRICTED UPLOADING BANDWIDTH! 

Cheers.
